City Council

  • City Council
City Council
360-400-5055

City Council Meetings

  • 2nd and 4th Tuesday of the Month 6:00 pm
  • Study Session: 1st Tuesday of the Month 6:00 pm
Sub Menu
  • Yelm City Council Application

Yelm City Council represents the needs and interests of the citizens of Yelm.  The seven-member Council establishes policy for the city, adopts the annual budget, and represents Yelm's interest on regional boards and commissions.

Council meetings are held at 6 p.m. on the second and fourth Tuesday of each month in the Council Chambers at Yelm City Hall, 106 2nd St. SE.  Community members are encouraged to attend all meetings and each agenda dedicates time at the beginning for public comments, questions, or concerns.

The current Council agenda and past meeting minutes are posted under Minutes & Agendas . The upcoming agenda is posted no later than the Friday before the meeting.
Tracey Wood Position 1 2023 – 2027 Term (360) 400-5055 traceyw@yelmwa.gov Councilmember Wood was elected in November 2023. Yelm Public Safety Committee, Vice Chair Transportation Policy Board TCOMM 911
Joseph Richardson

Liaison to Yelm Senior Center

Councilmember Crossman was elected  in November 2021. Yelm Public Services Committee, Chair South Thurston Economic Development Council (STEDI)
Stephanie Kangiser Position 4 2024 – 2025 Term (360) 400-5055 stephaniek@yelmwa.gov
Councilmember Kangiser was appointed by the City Council to fill the vacant position in 2024. Yelm Public Safety Committee Yelm Finance Committee SE Thurston Fire Authority
Brian Hess Position 5 2022 – 2025 Term (360) 400-5055 brianh@yelmwa.gov
Councilmember Hess was elected in 2021. Yelm Public Safety Committee, Chair Intercity Transit Authority Thurston Thrives Coordinating Council
David Johnstone
Position 6 2025 Term (360) 400-5055 davidj@yelmwa.gov Councilmember Johnstone was appointed in 2025. Solid Waste Advisory Committee (SWAC) Regional Housing Council (RHC) Thurston EMS Council Terry Kaminski Position 7 2018 – 2025 Term (360) 400-5055 terryk@yelmwa.gov Councilmember Kaminski was elected in 2017. Yelm Public Services Committee Yelm Finance Committee, Chair Nisqually River Council Thurston County Law & Justice
